Title: Provides that preference shall be given to certain sites when developing renewable energy generating projects
Summary: Provides that preference shall be given to certain sites when developing renewable energy generating projects; defines "agrivoltaics".
LawCode: Amd §§1005 & 1902, add §1885, Pub Auth L; amd §§138 & 139, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law and the public service law, in relation to giving preference to certain sites when developing renewable energy generating projects and to the definition of agrivoltaics
